name: 11 Cross country ski stadium Dobbiaco/Toblach - Fiames (along the Tour de Ski-track)
description: The cross country track takes along the old railway track from Dobbiaco/Toblach in the direction to Cortina, which was closed in the early 1960s.The nearby road with its several bus stops means that you can leave the trail at virtually any point, for example if you are tired or have problems with your equipment.
